rules_text:
Flying, first strike
Whenever an attacking creature you control dies, you may pay {R}. If you do, return this creature from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
[i]“We've beaten it off for now, but its body could be anywhere in Pawus. It'll come back.”
—Banoy, lookout[/i]
notes:
not a phoenix but has a phoenix-like recur ability, so I think it's fine?
